//

//     the code is regenerated.
// </auto-generated>

using System;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.Preconditions.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;

	public partial class TestCase
	{
		public Task ReadFileAsync(string path)
		{
			if (path == null)
			{
				throw new ArgumentNullException(nameof(path));
			}
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
		}

		public Task<int> DivideAsync(int a, int b)
		{
			if (b == 0) throw new InvalidOperationException();
			return InternalDivideAsync(a, b);
		}

		private async Task<int> InternalDivideAsync(int a, int b)
		{
			await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
			return a/b;
		}

		public Task<int> DivideShortAsync(short a, short b)
		{
			Requires.IsNotNull(b, nameof(b));
			return InternalDivideShortAsync(a, b);
		}

		private async Task<int> InternalDivideShortAsync(short a, short b)
		{
			await (SimpleFile.ReadAsync());
			return a/b;
		}

	}
}
